website_summaries.verdict: A concealer so lightweight you'll forget you're even wearing it.
pros: Serum concealer that feels light on the skin and blends easily
Coverage is easily buildable without looking cakey
Product dries quickly and doesn't separate or crease on oily skin
Brightening effect is perfect for hiding dark under-eye circles
From a brand known for ingredients that won't irritate the skin
cons: Needs to be built up to effectively cover redness

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to bare minerals. I have dark under eye circles and have tried a lot of drug store makeup brands for concealer. I recently started trying a few more expensive options to find something that really works and I think I will stick with this product! It has a great pigment and really lightens up my under eye area. Would definitely recommend. Worth the extra money too because you only need a little for it to cover up blemishes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t match well.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Not too heavy but I think the color I ordered was too dark. Looked a little yellow for my skin tone. I also use the foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Does not pair well with BareMinerals BarePro Powder Foundation
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to pair with my BareMinerals powder foundation. It does cover pigmentation and spots well. I would have been better off though with a powder concealer due to my age. If you don't have many wrinkles/younger skin, this product will work superbly for you. This doesn't wear well on my aging skin. UPDATE: I returned the product due to it "caking up" under my powder foundation. Will stay with the brand, just changing to a powder concealer instead of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hunter

customer_reviews.title: New favorite concealer
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use and how well it blends into my skin! I do find it creasing (only under my eyes) but I just gently rub it back in. I’m very picky about makeup and I like this. I love that it’s mineral based. It was very quick and easy ordering from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I loved the old product that got discontinued... Stroke of light. I called baremilerals to see what product replaced that and was told this was what I should now buy... But because of covid they weren't processing orders. So I bought it here... And it's not like stroke of light. Itsy heavy and thick and makes the skin under my eyes look cakey and it's just not the perfect thing the old stuff was for my undereyes. Won't buy again. It's just concealer. For heavy jobs. Not for undereye brightening and smoothing out the skin tone... This is for covering scars or tattoos.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth application. Does not crease in small wrinkles. Lasts well, yet washes off easily with cleanser. Nice quality applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Joann SH

customer_reviews.title: Takes so little to cover so much!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used a normal amount. Not needed! Just a small bit will cover a large under-eye area. I love the bareMineral products I've bought, and this product just adds to the love I have for this brand. Plus, the price was great! Fantastically quick delivery too---
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: I have struggled with dark under eye circles my entire ...
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with dark under eye circles my entire life. When I read the reviews for this I was so excited. I thought it would be the answer to years of trying to conceal the circles under my eyes. It does go on smooth and doesn't settle in the lines and creases under my eyes but the circles are still visible.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic-Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Bare Minerals for years and this concealer is great. With a good primer, I can use it on my whole face with only a few dots. I was so happy to buy it online and actually spend less than in retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Madigan

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only concealer that I can use alone, I've always had to use 2 in the past. Covers soooo well and lightens just right! I will never use anything else.....yay!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect concealer
customer_reviews.text: This concealer works sooooo well! The shade is perfect for my skin tone (I have a very fair complexion) and it goes on and stays on really well. A little goes a long way, too.
customer_reviews.author: Megan K. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for under eye circles
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's moisturizing and the he subtle color and texture helps to smooth my under eye circles and other blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer- non pore clogging 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Works Great to conceal breakouts and doesn’t cause more! Good coverag too!
customer_reviews.author: Tracee R Colburn

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love Bare minerals but could not go in person due to covid, excited it can be brought to me!
customer_reviews.author: K Kurz

customer_reviews.title: good coverage!
customer_reviews.text: glad i bought this concealer, it has great coverage on my fair skin where ever i have a breakout. blends really easily when dabbed on with a finger or sponge. would definitely consider purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Covers very well. Smooth and light. Thick enough to cover faults immediately but light enough to forget about. Blend well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Applies smooth and covers well!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t live without this concealer! Ever since I have discovered it, I can’t use anything else! It applies really smooth and covers those dark circles well!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Miller

customer_reviews.title: Covered My Dark Circles
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for me. Color was as I expected thanks to reading other reviews. I did not have any problems with the applicator as others have noted.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaK

customer_reviews.title: Bare minerals
customer_reviews.text: Very creamy, and blends well. (Not for dry skin without moisturizer)
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concealer
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite concealers for my dark undereye area. I'm very pale and have neutral undertones, I use this in the shade Fair.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: we have used this product in the past with good results
customer_reviews.author: Larry W. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coverage for dark circles
customer_reviews.text: Love how this products covers dark circles and blends with skin tone. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother who is 82 and covers and stays in place!
customer_reviews.author: mary e smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Really good coverage and texture. Lasts all day. Color was just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Holds really well
customer_reviews.text: I use it to conceal and brighten my dark circles. Best to follow up with the stick
customer_reviews.author: Adele Marquardt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite concelor, good price for a high end brand, and is very effective. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Mandel

customer_reviews.title: ... so I did notice a slight tendency to show fine lines.
customer_reviews.text: I am older so I did notice a slight tendency to show fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Robia Kaylor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't cover as I expected, does the job. Spreads thinner then others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it covers well not cakey or heavy and it removes as easily as it covers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I expected I little bit more luminosity from this concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Bareskin complete coverage concealer is great for evening out your skin tones before applying your makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Wilson

customer_reviews.title: best coverage
customer_reviews.text: great coverage. smooth not patchy, does't make my skin look flakey like other products. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better coverage than the potted concealer by bare minerals
customer_reviews.text: Better coverage than the potted concealer by bare minerals. I really like how easy it is to apply. It spreads easily and I love the color on my skin tone. Beware, it does tend to get creased if used too thick and doesn't mix well with dry skin!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: This is the only concealer I could find that actually covered my under eye dark circles, and it doesnt take much. I love this product. It's the only make up I will actually say is worth the money. I love it! I've tried countless products for under the eyes ( even makeup meant for covering tattoos) and this is still the best makeup I have ever worn!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Fake Reviews lol
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I got this after I searched Amazon for 30 minutes and read reviews and needed a full coverage concealer. Wth? How and why are there so many 5 star reviews of this??? It is watery! It is like regular makeup in this small container. It took 3 coats and powder between each one just to get some type of coverage. I could have used my own regular makeup and gotten the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Pandalana W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concealer but little goes long way
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the bare minerals serum concealer for covering without looking too made up but usually use fair. Fair was running out and seemed a bit dark as summer ended so bought light and working well with fair complexion, dark hair and blue eyes. It seems to work best if use sparingly as a little goes a long way. The more you layer it can get too caked. Less is definitely more with this product and if that’s followed then this concealer is fabulous. It lasts all day and one tube seems to last a year!
customer_reviews.author: Jetta D

customer_reviews.title: A little dab will do
customer_reviews.text: The first application I did I globbed it on b/c I was used to my former brand... uhm, no. I looked like Data from Star Trek. A little goes a long way! Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Moore

customer_reviews.title: wow incredible
customer_reviews.text: Practically imperceptible (looks natural). Love it. I just didn't wear concealer for a few years and am shocked at how much it makes me look good and rested. I have SO MANY allergies so thank you for not using nut oils or seed oil or gluten or weird plants.. no reaction whatever . Love it. Only looks a dry if your skin is already dry
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 'Fair' tone, and it is perfect for my skin. After using the applicator to dab it on, I then used a queue tip to blend it in, and then dusted over than with a powder foundation. It covers the dark under eye circles and the veins showing through the skin better than any other concealer I have tried. So glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Product fail for me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product did not sit well on my skin. The coverage was “meh,” and after a few hours of wear it looked flakey, cakey, and blotchy. Could just be that it didn’t interact well with my other skin care products. But for me it’s a no.
customer_reviews.author: yes/no/maybe

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage, not too heavy and doesn’t settle in creases. Fair was too light for me though so if I decide to order again will try the light. I usually use Summer Bisque mixed with a little Well Rested and may go back to that, still undecided.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a longgg way which is great. Love that it'll last long for sure
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a longgg way which is great. Love that it'll last long for sure... but I got the lightest color and still it's a bit too dark. Especially for concealer. I know I'm pale... but not THAT pale haha. I'll still use, but maybe not the next time around.
customer_reviews.author: arlah

customer_reviews.title: EYE MUST
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage with a light enough texture that won't give you that caked on look. Lasts throughout an 8 hour work day and has a soft, natural look to it.
customer_reviews.author: VIP Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Too yellow for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin. There is too much yellow in even the fair for me. Was using stroke of light 1 for cover and make up It was discontinued. Will try to return the one I did not open.
customer_reviews.author: carlee

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up for under the eyes and more
customer_reviews.text: Great product I’ve been using BM for years. I am happy with this product and will continue to use it. Great coverage hides dark circles under eyes.
customer_reviews.author: meryl swartz

customer_reviews.title: ... this concealer before so I knew that I would like the product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this concealer before so I knew that I would like the product. I did receive the product that was advertised and it was the correct size and item. I'm super happy about the purchase process and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Bare Minerals is a great brand. Even though I use this daily, it lasts for several months. It is worth the cost to avoid breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Dayfam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Doesn’t go on greasy, doesn’t look caked on or settle into fine lines around my eyes. Worth the extra money vs drug store concealers
customer_reviews.author: hillster

customer_reviews.title: Looks official but...
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning as I ordered a different shade. All boxes were opened as well but the items did not appear to have been used or contaminated (hopefully).
customer_reviews.author: HisMrs

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage.
customer_reviews.text: It takes just a little to cover you face and make it soft and looks good. I really like it. Thank you for this product and I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bazzanella

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. You do not need much at all when applying. It does not look dry or cakey.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: I suggest going to one deeper color than what you think matches your skin the best. Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: The color was too light. I suggest going to one deeper color than what you think matches your skin the best. Good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Would never buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I like how thin this is, but settles in my creases(thirty four) and it is not a full coverage. I'm sad I spent so much money. I wouldn't buy this ever again!
customer_reviews.author: J&M Moorhead

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works great to reduce the look of dark circles
customer_reviews.text: this stuff works great to reduce the look of dark circles, and despite the size lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: denise p

customer_reviews.title: Covers well
customer_reviews.text: This covers my under eye area well with a small amount of product. I also use a little on my nose to take out some of my natural redness in that area before applying my foundation.
customer_reviews.author: TNWoman

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many concealers, this is the best that I have found to conceal my circles and puffy eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Pam marks

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage concealer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this concealer. It provides great coverage but you have to be careful to make sure it blends in well or it will cake up a little.
customer_reviews.author: bethangel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coverage with dewy look
customer_reviews.text: Use this over my foundation under my eyes and along my jawline.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, is not heavy on the face. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best concealer I have ever used. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Meagen

customer_reviews.title: never buy again
customer_reviews.text: Awful product!! This immediately creased upon me applying it and looked dry. It took a couple tries to cover the dark circles under my eyes, and even still was not gods coverage. I was still fixing the creases 15 minutes later...terrible product
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage. Nice putting on. Nice color. Soft wand. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A Misenar

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage, Easy To Blend, Great Eye Brightener!
customer_reviews.text: Such a smooth application and blending is easy as cake (using a beauty blender or tapered kabuki brush). I got the color Fair and it's the perfect shade to brighten my under eyes a tad with giving great coverage. A little seems to go a long way, one dip into the tube and you can cover underneath both eyes with plenty of product. It's definitely one of my fav concealers :) no complaints on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this concealer. I am pale and it's challenging to find a product labeled as fair that is actually light enough for my pasty skin, but fair is actually fair with this product. I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amberzon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This took care of a special need of mine. I appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: May's Daughter

product_meta.title: bareMinerals BareSkin Complete Coverage Concealer, Fair, 0.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: A silky-smooth, complete coverage, concealer and serum formula. It instantly reduces the appearance of dark circles, discoloration, and other imperfections for a beautifully even-toned complexion and give skin a brightened, lustrous finish.
feature_bullets: Mineral-coated optical pigments to help brighten and diffuse the appearance of dark circles and imperfections.
Formulated with antioxidant Lilac Plant Stem Cells
Hydrating humectants to help nourish the delicate under-eye area
Country of origin is United States
